If not, see 22 <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. */ 23 24 #ifndef _X86GPRINTRIN_H_INCLUDED 25 # error "Never use <uintrintrin.h> directly; include <x86gprintrin.h> instead." 26 #endif 27 28 #ifndef _UINTRNTRIN_H_INCLUDED 29 #define _UINTRNTRIN_H_INCLUDED 30 31 #ifdef __x86_64__ 32 33 #ifndef __UINTR__ 34 #pragma GCC push_options 35 #pragma GCC target ("uintr") 36 #define __DISABLE_UINTR__ 37 #endif /* __UINTR__ */ 38 39 struct __uintr_frame 40 { 41 /* RIP of the interrupted user process. */ 42 unsigned long long rip; 43 /* RFLAGS of the interrupted user process. */ 44 unsigned long long rflags; 45 /* RSP of the interrupted user process. */ 46 unsigned long long rsp; 47 }; 48 49 extern __inline void 50 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 51 _clui (void) 52 { 53 __builtin_ia32_clui (); 54 } 55 56 extern __inline void 57 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 58 _stui (void) 59 { 60 __builtin_ia32_stui (); 61 } 62 63 extern __inline void 64 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 65 _senduipi (unsigned long long __R) 66 { 67 __builtin_ia32_senduipi (__R); 68 } 69 70 extern __inline unsigned char 71 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 72 _testui (void) 73 { 74 return __builtin_ia32_testui (); 75 } 76 77 #ifdef __DISABLE_UINTR__ 78 #undef __DISABLE_UINTR__ 79 #pragma GCC pop_options 80 #endif /* __DISABLE_UINTR__ */ 81 82 #endif 83 84 #endif /* _UINTRNTRIN_H_INCLUDED. */
